text: Everyone can stop addressing [Name] as Master. 👑
[Name], you can take your elbows off the table now. Have some manners! 🧖‍♂️
You can touch the table again. 👐
[Name] can pronounce vowels again. 🗣️
[Name], you can speak in your own accent again. Have some respect! 🗣️🌍
Everyone can stop dancing to [Name]'s voice. 💃🎶
[Name] can communicate normally again. 🗣️✉️
Everyone can stop taking sips to [Name]'s voice. 🥤
[Name], you can take off that stupid hat! 👒
[Name], you can stop singing your every sentence now. Give everyone's ears a break! 🎵
Everyone can stop meowing when [Name] speaks. Weirdos. 🐱
[Name], you can stop talking like a robot. Be human again! 🤖➡️👤
[Name], you can stop speaking in a British accent. Brits out! 🇬🇧
You can curse again without risking having to sip. 🤬
[Name] and [Name2], you can let go of each other now! 👥✋
[Name], you're not captain anymore! ⚓️
[Name], you're not the magician anymore. 🎩✨
You can speak not like Yoda anymore. (You don't have to speak like Yoda anymore. That sentence is weird.) 🙊
[Name], no more hand massage for you. 🖐️❌
Everyone can stop following [Name]'s orders. Freedom! 🚫🙅‍♂️
Everyone can stop whispering again. Speak up! 🔊
[Name], you can stop speaking in rhyme. No more poetic words! 📝🚫
[Name], you are not the truth or dare master anymore! 😂🚫
Everyone can speak in their own language again. Embrace diversity! 🗣️🌍
[Name] can stop communicating in charades. Use your words! 🙊🚫
Everyone can stop imitating animal sounds. Be human again! 🐾🚫
[Name], you can stop miming. Sacre bleu! 🙉🚫
Everyone can speak in their own accent again. Embrace your natural voice! 🗣️🌟
[Name], you can stop talking like a pirate. Arrr, matey! 🏴‍☠️🚫
Everyone can speak in their own voice again. Be yourself! 🗣️🌟
[Name], you can stop drinking every time the person to your right does. Stay sober! 🚱🚫
[Name] and [Name2], you can have your birth names back now. Embrace your true identities! 👥🌟
[Name] is no longer the designated DJ. Everyone can stop dancing. Hit pause! 🎵🚫
[Name], you can now use multi-syllable words. Expand your vocabulary! 📚🔠
[Name], you can now stop completing every sentence with the word 'banana'. Farewell, fruity expression! 🍌🚫
[Name], you can now take off your blindfold. Open your eyes! 👀🚫
[Name], you can now do things without asking [Name2]'s permission. Assert your independence! 🚀🔓
[Name], you can now speak in the first person again. Reclaim your personal voice! 🗣️🌟
[Name], you can now stop making funny faces when you speak. Keep a straight face! 😐🚫
[Name], you can now stop giving [Name2] compliments every time they speak. Silence the flattery! 🙊🚫
[Name], you can now stop doing dares from other players every time you move from your spot. Dare-free zone! 🚫🎯
[Name], you can now drink with your dominant hand again. Cheers to freedom! 🍻🖐️
[Name], you can now drink from your own cup. Sip from your personal vessel! 🥤🚫
[Name] and [Name2], you no longer have to swap seats when your names are mentioned. Sit comfortably! 🪑🚫
[Name], you can now speak in complete sentences. Express yourself fully! 🗣️🌟
[Name], you can now use words that don't start with the letter 'A'. Expand your linguistic range! 🔠🚫
[Name], you can now use words that aren't related to food. Explore new topics! 🍽️🚫
[Name], you can now use words that aren't related to animals. Diversify your vocabulary! 🦁🚫
[Name], you can now use words that aren't related to the colour blue again! 🔵
Everyone can now speak normally. Say it the usual way! 🗣️🌟
